author: samcm
content: It's a good day for all Ethereum enjoyoors: 2 forks within 12 hours. Sepolia will be upgrading to Fusaka <t:1760427360:R>

author: barnabasbusa
content:
The sepolia fork is in 15 minutes. Please make sure your nodes are updated to the latest release of your client!

In case there are issues, we will meet in the voice channel on the eth R&D discord server: <#814925424726900766> 

Tools for debugging:
https://dora.sepolia.ethpandaops.io/
https://forky.sepolia.ethpandaops.io/
https://tracoor.sepolia.ethpandaops.io/
Lab: https://lab.ethpandaops.io/xatu-data?network=sepolia

author: barnabasbusa
content:
Sepolia has finalized fusaka fork ğŸš€. We saw a ~17% drop in participation, this was caused by operators forgetting to update their infra. We have reached out to everyone affected.

Edit: We are back to 99%+ participation now.
